name: Coordinate
description: A Coordinate is a wrapper for an integer-valued coordinate. Subclasses of the Coordinate class can be used for stricter typing of coordinates (e.g. x, y, and z coordinates, separately), as opposed to using one type (e.g. int) for all coordinates.

instanceVariables.name: value
instanceVariables.description: The integer value of this Coordinate

methods.name: Coordinate()
methods.description: Constructs a Coordinate with the given value
